highlights: Designed and implemented an SSO exemption flow for tenant-level SSO enforcement and exemptions.
Integrated DUO Push authentication for secure identity verification.
Developed automated reseller onboarding system via Pax8 Marketplace.
Built and published Tech Vault Chrome Extension with React UI inside Shadow DOM, OAuth login, JIT account creation, and credential storage.
Designed and implemented full billing & usage infrastructure with tier-based pricing, historical insights, and trend visualizations.
Enhanced and maintained legacy systems across Node.js, React.js, and Ruby.
Developed multiple services in microservice architecture using Kafka, MongoDB, AWS, and GCP.
Built IaC solutions with CloudFormation & Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments.
Integrated APIs with Google Maps, Apple Maps, Instagram, Twitter, and other third-party services.
Implemented Radius Scan tool to visualize competitor performance on maps (React, Node.js, Kafka, Redis, MongoDB).
Optimized costs with SPOT servers & Lambda functions on AWS.
Developed real-time reporting & alerting system via RingCentral groups with configurable MongoDB-driven reports.
Created Pub/Sub Service in Node.js with Bull, RabbitMQ, and Redis for ETL workflows including Salesforce & Bloomberg integrations.
Developed Financial Statements Module for parsing, validating, and generating styled Excel sheets with custom validations.
Built an Abstract Document Manager to integrate with File System, S3, Mayan, SharePoint, etc.
Developed onboarding utility reducing client onboarding effort by up to 50% (JavaScript, Java, Python).
Managed Calculation Module with JSON-configured inputs processed and persisted via Mustache templates.
